  5. æ ¼å¼åŒ–æ›´åŠ å¥½ç”¨æ— æ„Ÿå¹¶è®°ä½ä½ç½®ï¼Œä¸€ç§å¾ˆæ— æ„Ÿçš„æ ¼å¼åŒ–ä½“éªŒ

Better use ğŸ§›â€â™€ï¸ï¼š

  1. Compared with 1.6.0, it fixes the problem of copy pictures to the editor, sorting by title, comfortable adjustment of window text spacing, and supports the mode of shift + enter without automatically adding serial numbers.
  2. Fine tune 3 font rendering logics, Times New Roman, Helvetica Neue, JetBrains Mono, for a different style.
  3. Export format support for Html, with improved PDF and Image export effects.
  4. Markmap height can be set individually, and Markmap are now supported in PPT mode.
  5. Formatting is even better with no sensation and remembering the position, a very senseless formatting experience.
  6. For large preview scenes you can use the img tag loading="lazy" for lazy loading, which renders much faster.
  7. Fixing the carriage return flicker at the bottom of very few machines, adding a second confirmation for restart scenes, completely solving the blue underline, duplication of line feed titles, optimizing the carriage return, turning off text dragging, adding more features to mermaid, optimizing the position of PPT page turns, document deletion experience optimization.

  6. ä¿®å¤äº†æå°‘æœºå™¨åº•éƒ¨å›è½¦é—ªåŠ¨é—®é¢˜ã€é‡å¯åœºæ™¯å¢åŠ äºŒæ¬¡ç¡®è®¤ã€å½»åº•è§£å†³è“è‰²åˆ’çº¿ã€æ¢è¡Œæ ‡é¢˜å¤åˆ¶é—®é¢˜ã€åºå·å›è½¦ä¼˜åŒ–ã€å…³é—­æ–‡å­—æ‹–æ‹½ã€mermaid å¢åŠ æ›´å¤šç‰¹æ€§ã€PPT ä¸‹ç¿»é¡µä½ç½®ä¼˜åŒ–ã€æ–‡æ¡£åˆ é™¤ä½“éªŒä¼˜åŒ–

Better use ğŸ§›â€â™€ï¸ï¼š

  1. Fine tune 3 font rendering logics, Times New Roman, Helvetica Neue, JetBrains Mono, for a different style.
  2. Export format support for Html, with improved PDF and Image export effects.
  3. Markmap height can be set individually, and Markmap are now supported in PPT mode.
  4. Formatting is even better with no sensation and remembering the position, a very senseless formatting experience.
  5. For large preview scenes you can use the img tag loading="lazy" for lazy loading, which renders much faster.
  6. Fixing the carriage return flicker at the bottom of very few machines, adding a second confirmation for restart scenes, completely solving the blue underline, duplication of line feed titles, optimizing the carriage return, turning off text dragging, adding more features to mermaid, optimizing the position of PPT page turns, document deletion experience optimization.
